name: Happy Haunting
description:
Made for SpookyJam 2019!__________________________________________

Inspired by the story of human bones being dug up during the Chicago History Museum's construction, Happy Haunting is a charming story about a cute little ghost called Bartholomew, who is trying to pass his memories onto his granddaughter Shelby. There's one small hiccup though -- people can't see ghosts.

However, if you can trick a human into revealing you themselves, you can become visible and converse with the living!

This game features bright, colorful pixel art, relaxed point-and-click story driven gameplay, a cute soundtrack, and a surprising ending.

Art/Code/Sound done by me.

*note: pushed a new version with a hint and a bug fix regarding certain item slots
